Reviews.Title: This camera changed my mind......
Reviews.Author: LoJack
Reviews.Content: About 420TVL CCTV cams.  First off, let me say that I read all the reviews on this camera.  Twice.  I could not believe the positive glowing things being said, since this is only a 420TVL cam.  I usually turn my nose up at anything below 540TVL's.  But since I was getting one more cam for the inside of my garage, I surmised that I could bump my high requirements down.  I own 10 cameras (I have a 8 channel DVR, and a 4 channel DVR---watch out! once you get into installing CCTV cams around your house, you just might get bit by the "bug"....Camera Acquisition Syndrome!!) LOL!!  I also installed my entire system.  I really enjoy educating myself on the details of this.  Since I am retired (ex-NASA employee) I have plenty of time to putter around.  But, back to my review...the camera arrived in just a few days.  I unboxed it and first thought...what a small camera!  And I really didn't think that 26 IR led's would suffice to even see anything in a dark garage!  ( I have installed motion lights in my garage to cut down on the electric bills. I've got them set to five minutes of inactivity.  There are always those family members who 'forget" to turn off the lights after exiting the garage.  Anyways, I got the camera mounted, went to my DVR room in the house, and plugged in the included 12volt adapter.  (By the way...this is a 'switching" 12Volt 500ma adapter, so they ship a qualilty ac adapter.  ALL of my cameras have the regulated switching adapters plugged into an uninterruptible supply.  Yes, I am kind of anal.  haha.) As soon as I inserted the adapter's plug into the camera cable...WOW!  This camera seems to be sharper than my Sony 540TVL Super HAD camera!!  Yes, the reviews are true!  These are not fake reviews!  This camera is razor sharp.  I don't know how 420TVL can produce such a wonderful image.  very, very detailed.  I am running this through an Insignia LED/LCD TV ("hybrid").  It is a 32" TV.  And the night vision is remarkable.  Extremely clear and sharp.As a final write up, I have always made it a point to refuse to buy the 1/4" CCD chip.  I always went for the 1/3".  Nowhere in the listed "specs." on  this camera does it say that it is 1/4" ccd.  So, I just "assumed" it was.  When I opened the box and read the sheet, there it was-- 1/4" ccd.  I felt that I had made a big mistake.  Well, after seeing what this camera produces, I have also changed my mind on the 1/4" ccd.  By the way, this camera is IP55 rated.  Just for those who want to know.  Here is what IP55 means, for those who really want to know:"Ingress of dust is not entirely prevented, but it must not enter in sufficient quantity to interfere with the satisfactory operation of the equipment; complete protection against contact.Water projected by a nozzle (6.3mm) against enclosure from any direction shall have no harmful effects."  Wikipedia.So, it seems like it's good enough for my application.  But my other cameras are at least IP65 rated. However, they are outside, not in a garage. The first IP rating digit (5 in this case)  is for dust, the second (also 5) is for water.I am extremely happy with this camera and might even order another to put under the tree.  For myself! LOL.  BUY THIS CAMERA IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR AN INEXPENSIVE SOLUTION TO FIGHT CRIME.  You will see how the UPS guy really delivers all your packages.  haha. WORTH EVERY PENNY.  Free shipping sealed the deal.The only that I don't like is the color.  White.  But, that's just nitpicking.  I can easily remedy that with a spray paint job.  Now, where  did I put my X-Acto knife!LoJack

Reviews.Title: Good camera for a low price!
Reviews.Author: EchoMS
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately, the people with whom we live around seem to think we're in old west Deadwood. There are so many criminals on our block,it's astounding! After the crazy cat hoarder next door continually vandalized our property we bought this and it works great! We've had one inside for about six months and recently installed one outside, each facing different directions. The night vision is clear and everything records nicely. The range of this camera is spectacular, about four houses in each direction per camera. Aside from knowing when people are messing with our property, we find it somewhat amusing to watch the drug dealer across the street as a never-ending stream of cars make quick stops. Anyway, the cameras are easy to install/use. If you live near trashy, uncivilized people, this is a good option until you can move.

Reviews.Title: I'm ordering another one!
Reviews.Author: Maxcat
Reviews.Content: I spent far too much time researching these bullet cameras but I'm glad I relied on the reviews here. I was in search of a replacement/supplemental camera for my Q-See system. I had installed my Q-See cameras and while I was happy with the coverage for the areas that allowed for the cameras to get a "long" shot, the performance of the Q-See cameras for tighter distances is poor. No wonder, they are 4.8mm cameras with a much limited field of view. The images produced by the Q-See cameras and their Sony CCD are nice and the night vision is good but having installed one of these VideoSecu cameras, I'm ordering another one. The daytime image quality is very close to on par with the Q-See camera with perhaps just a little less sharpness but we're not talking about HDTV here so I'm fine with it. The night vision is as good as the Q-See. (EDIT: After a couple more nights with the VideoSecu side by side with Q-Sees, I have to give the edge to Q-See in the night vision department. There seems to be a little bit of a bluish interference with the VideoSecus. The Q-Sees seem clearer at night. The night vision range is about the same. I'm still happy though. Price versus overall performance is still good.)There seemed to be several excellent VideoSecu cameras here on Amazon but none of them offered the mounting option this one does. I have done an under-eave mounting with my cameras and these mounted are very accommodating. They mounts have quite a range of motion and can be mounted under or behind the camera. The range of motion blows away the Q-See mounts too.The main reason I bought this camera is the 3.6mm lens. It was a good choice. The field of view is significantly better than with the Q-See's 4.8mm. I have posted a couple of cellphone camera snaps of my security monitor showing a before and after of the same location where the camera was mounted in the same spot at about 20 feet up. If you need a wider field of view, these cameras are great and the price makes it a steal. (EDIT: Added two more comparison photos after buying another one of these cameras. I am even more pleased with my purchases!)Note about Warehouse Seller: They were fantastic! I have bought cables and this camera from them and they were extremely fast. My orders were processed within hours and to my door in under 3 days. (EDIT: Second camera I bought was shipped and received almost as fast. I'm still happy.)

Reviews.Title: works great, like viewing angle
Reviews.Author: Barry Alan Porterfield
Reviews.Content: I bought this to add to my camera setup. Mine are currently all bullet type from Harbor Freight, which work good, but mainly straight line of site with blinders type view. Original one covered my truck and most of driveway, this one covered my entire front yard. The viewing angle is phenomenal. even better you don't get the whole fish eye look from the angle.

Reviews.Title: Bad Camera
Reviews.Author: Drexel
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these in December 2012. I hooked them up to a stand alone DVR unit. It had a decent quality picture for about a day and then started fading to black. After two days you could not even see a picture and on day 3 it lost the signal entirely. Hooked a different camera up and it works great on the same cable. The camera was not even what was pictured. Luckily Amazon made an exception to return this 4 months later as I bought this as a present for christmas and hooked up in April when we re-tinned our our shop. Haven't tried the other one yet. Buyer beware.

Reviews.Title: Not the same camera as before
Reviews.Author: Lumanator
Reviews.Content: I have ordered this camera over 25 times...It used to be a great camera with a 1/4 sony ccd chip that was stamped (made in japan)  now the housing and ccd have changed for the worse...it is now a generic 1/3 ccd sensor...I want the old camera back...This has become typical business practices of large amazon super sellers like videosecu

Reviews.Title: Good Camera at a Great Price.
Reviews.Author: Michael Bass
Reviews.Content: Pros: Clear picture, both in color(daytime)& in B/W (nightime).  Strong infrared LED's, nightime vision 40+ ft.  Well built. Good bracket.  Price.Cons: Audio would be nice.From experience I can tell you that for the price you will not find a better product, so much so that after receiving this camera just yesterday I ordered a second one today.

Reviews.Title: great value cam
Reviews.Author: Jason P
Reviews.Content: so far this unit is working great, easy to setup and solid metal case suitable as a outdoor camera. It also has a "cap" cover useful for rainy days. The wiring might need to be made a little bit longer. It's a great value product.

Reviews.Title: NO WARRANTY!
Reviews.Author: Blazes Boylan
Reviews.Content: My title says it all.  This camera was perfectly adequate while it was working, but after about six months it simply stopped functioning altogether.  Most other cameras in this price range carry a one year warranty.  If you visit VideoSecu's website you won't find any links to RMA, service, warranty, support, or just about anything else except products and sales.  You don't have to spend much more to get an equivalent camera with an actual warranty.  VideoSecu's bulk RG59 Siamese video cable is an excellent bargain that I would purchase again, but I can't recommend their cameras or power supplies.

Reviews.Title: Great Value/Outstanding Performance
Reviews.Author: David J. Murphy
Reviews.Content: Don't let the small size and price fool you!  This little powerhouse is up to the task!  Great picture quality and small size is only two of it's best qualities.  Night vision is acceptable considering the relatively small number if IR's at 26.  Installation is a snap! Completely weather proof...has handled Florida storms and humidity with nary a burp!  A must buy! My next camera will also be by Videosecu but will be Model WA4,  Need the extra IR range (56 IR's) and the mic (questionable neighbors!) Little more money but the mic, 50 cable and power supply is included.

Reviews.Title: Good for the Price
Reviews.Author: rca
Reviews.Content: This camera is hard to beat for the money. Works great right out of box. I wanted surveillance for front door, this fits the bill perfectly. Image is sharp & clear. I considered another brand from another source but decided on this one. I couldn't be more satisfied & happy with my choice. For my purpose this is the one.

Reviews.Title: Much smaller than I expected
Reviews.Author: Portland Ghosts
Reviews.Content: This camera is about 1/3 the size of my other CCTV camera but looks exactly the same otherwise.I set up both cameras on my DVR and let them record all night long. The next day I reviewed the video and the only difference I noticed was this camera recorded a "little" bit darker due to having a few less LED infrared lights (26 as opposed to 30).I unboxed the camera, screwed on the base, connected the RCA cables and attached it to my DVR in under 5 minutes and it was recording. Has a nice wide field of view. Due to the fact this camera comes bundled with an AC power adapter this is a really great deal. Solidly built and works very well.I may post some video in the future. Highly recommended. Don't let the small size fool you because it is VERY small.

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm
Reviews.Author: Ernman "Ernman"
Reviews.Content: one can spend a lot more money for a cctv camera and not get a whole lot better product...this is a great camera for the money, decent night vision and good day vision. i'd have no problem using these in any installation that doesn't require motion, or extremely high resolution...

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Charles Hague
Reviews.Content: Great camera!  Mounting bracket allows angle adjustment.  Easily connected to a Q-See system. Does not include connection cable so make sure you have that.  The mounting bracket could be sturdier but so far adequate.

Reviews.Title: Never Powered On, Mfg Won't Resolve
Reviews.Author: Bookworm
Reviews.Content: After months of trying different 12V power supplies, video capture cards and cables (that worked with other items), Empire and VideoSecu now inform me that, after I was required to keep trying their different suggestions for several months, they will now not exchange the product or refund my money.  All I wanted was a working camera.  Camera has never shown any sign of working.  Now I am out the $44 + shipping.

Reviews.Title: The VideoSecu IR24S is a great 420TVL camera for the price - just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: noah44444
Reviews.Content: I gave this camera a 5 out of 5 because I honestly feel these cameras are a great deal for the price I paid which was $35 (each) shipped to my door. Not everyone can afford to shell out a lot of money just to put in a home security system. I purchased two of these VideoSecu IR24S cameras to monitor our driveway after a robbery and I have now had them installed outdoors for about 3 weeks with no issues even through the recent frozen December frost (currently about 25 degrees F at night). I love being able to just glance up at my monitor now 24/7 when I hear something outside rather than running to turn on the porch light and then to a window to see what's going on out there.The video clarity on these VideoSecu IR24S cameras is great for a 420 TVL CCD camera - night or day. I bought two of these cameras to replace the two cameras I had purchased at Harbor Freight made by Bunker Hill Security which were also about $35 each. The video is much more clear than the Harbor Freight cameras and the IR light at night is also much brighter. The night view on the Harbor Freight cameras was basically worthless but these cameras by VideoSecu have a much better picture. I can actually see inside the cab of my car and truck at night if they are parked facing the cameras. It was well worth returning the Harbor Freight cameras after waiting a few days for the VideoSecu cameras to arrive using the free super saver shipping method.I combined two of these cameras with an old outdated computer I had just laying around and two PCI style analog video capture cards I bought off of Amazon and Ebay for about $15 each  to create a very cheap but adequate home security system. My budget to do the whole system including 2 cameras, 2 cables, and 2 video cards was about $120.I currently have two of these VideoSecu IR24S cameras connected to my old Pentium 4 / Windows XP PC tower equipped with the two Hauppauge WinTV PVR-150 (Internal PCI style) video capture cards for video input along with the Blue IRIS security software made by Perspective for motion detection video recording.I paid about $70 for the 2 cameras together and they came with the correct working power supplies.I paid about $18 more for the two 50' power/video cables together (also offered through VideoSecu) that you WILL need to mount this camera anywhere outside.I paid about $30 for the 2 Hauppauge PVR-150  video tuners together (used).PROS:Great picture quality for a $35 analog video style security camera with just 420 TVL.Bright IR lights for night vision mode with just the built-in 24 IR LEDs.Automatically switched to the night vision mode when needed without a dark window in between.Comes with a the power supply and a warning sticker :-).Very easy to mount and install using supplied hardware.CONS:The included mounting bracket is a little lightweight and would not stand up to very much abuse.Did not include the required video cabling needed to install this camera outside.

Reviews.Title: Infrared failure
Reviews.Author: Lynn Arceneaux
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in October 2011 and the infrared system went out in the middle of January 2012.  It is bad when I went to review footage from a neighbor's burglary and I was not able to see anything due to no video at night.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Peter Miller "Bored guy"
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use to monitor my cargo yard here in Afghanistan, it's a lot better than the POS camera that I had before but it's still not perfect. You won't be able to read license plates or any of that stuff but it'll let you know what's going on.Like I said, it's a good little camera but there are some annoying flaws. First, the mount is made from really cheap steel. If you mount it outdoors near any kind of wind, you'll need to reinforce the mount because it keeps coming loose and starts flopping around. I just used a couple small pieces of duct tape and it works great. The other flaw is also for outdoor use. When the IR lights turn on, if there is any dust in the wind, the reflections on the dust particles will make it look like it's snowing outside. It doesn't really detract from the picture quality, after awhile it's even kind of soothing but just so you know.Bottom line, not bad at all. I'm buying 2 more. Oh, and you do need to buy the accessory cables, it doesn't come with them.

Reviews.Title: Not too bad
Reviews.Author: KelVarnson
Reviews.Content: This camera is OK.  The main thing that it has going for it is its small size, it really is a nice little package.  The mount is among my favorites as far as flexibility and ruggedness, although it does require a metric allen wrench (not included) to adjust it.This camera unfortunately had a few negatives, performance-wise.  The picture was "noisier" than others I have tried, both in daytime and in nightvision, although the nightvision is plenty bright.  Also, this camera exhibited a dark horizontal bar that slowly scrolled up the screen in night vision mode.  This usually indicates some source of 60Hz interference, although none of the other cameras in my system did this, even when I swapped them into this one's place as a test.  So there seems to be some susceptibility to 60Hz.This is also not a wide-angle camera, so consider that in your application.This camera does not compare favorably to another camera that I got for the same price, the VideSecu IR30A: VideoSecu Outdoor Infrared Day Night Vision Home Security Camera Weatherproof 1/3" SONY Super HAD CCD 3.6mm Wide View Angle Lens 420TV Lines 30 IR LEDs A12  I really like that camera.Edited to add:For all of the people complaining about me comparing differently-priced cameras, GO BACK AND READ MY ORIGINAL REVIEW (above). Note that I said "I got for the same price", because at the time I bought them both, they WERE the same price.  I can't control what happens to the prices after I write the review.

Reviews.Title: Very Poor Camera  !!
Reviews.Author: BWW
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera for the low price. As in other reviews the picture is washed/ very dark/ not clear.. You can see that there is a car there but can't tell what color it is as an example..Put it up this morning/ returning it this afternoon..As the old saying goes, you get what you pay for most of the time..

Reviews.Title: So-so. Very low contrast and poor shadow detail for current model
Reviews.Author: AC Palmer
Reviews.Content: For this current model (white), my results were pretty unspectacular. I have this set up on a rear patio and a more expensive Sony CCD model in front. The difference in images between the two is stunning.Resolution on both is so-so, but the area where this VideoSecu really falls down is in contrast, shadow detail, and dynamic range. The image is COMPLETELY lacking in any shadow detail and looks like it has about 3 stops of dynamic range, worse than the camera on a 1st generation iPhone. If you have a scene where there is a sunlit ground area in part of the image, and shaded areas in the rest, the camera will expose to not blow out the brightest area and completely kill any detail in the shaded area, making it appear way too dark.Looking at the same lit scene with the Sony CCD cam (forget the model, it was about $75 from Amazon), the dynamic range is MUCH greater with much more gradation visible from light to dark.I am very much wishing I'd spent another $50 or so to get a good camera for my back patio, as now that this one is installed it's a pain to take it out and reinstall a new one. Not sure if I will be keeping it or not. Well, for 30 bucks or so, nobody should expect too much!UPDATE - I just saw this camera's night vision performance and upgraded the rating from 2 to 3 stars. It actually does quite well at night with very good illumination and decent detail. MUCH better than the daytime performance. So if your main concern is night vision performance, then this isn't so bad.

Reviews.Title: These are worth the money.
Reviews.Author: KAWIKA
Reviews.Content: installed it damn near a year ago. this camerea is fine, picture looks the same as the really expensive cameras i originally bought

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Martin Coates
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for awhile now and I have no complaints, it's a durable little camera. I live in an apartment and have had two bikes stolen off the deck so I decided to purchase this little camera and haven't been disappointed. I have since purchased two small flat-tvs and have them stationed in the dining area and the other in the main bedroom and now I can see the mailman, ups-man and the pizza-man. I can see who have been to my door when I'm not home, I just love this little camera. This is not a spy camera from space people but for home security it'll do the job nicely. I would have given this camera 5 stars if they would have included the video cable along with BNC Connectors and made it a complete kit.

Reviews.Title: nice size, good picture.
Reviews.Author: Jon R. R.
Reviews.Content: I have older "bullet" cams and dome cams around my home outside..  This one is substantially smaller than my other bullet, so much easier to install and not nearly as noticeable.  The picture AND night vision is as good or better than the others, though. I may be replacing others with more of these.  Could it be better? Yes, but probably not at this price.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price!
Reviews.Author: EM from New Jersey
Reviews.Content: Purchased this particular infrared video camera based on the reviews of the customers! When I received it, I couldn't  hook it up to a regular RCA connection because you need a connection called bnc cable or adapter..which I ended up purchasing . As I hooked it up to a regular CRT tv, clarity for daytime and nighttime( in black and white) seems fairly good at distance up to 30 feet... Long time durability and quality I'm not yet sure, but would recommend this for someone looking for a decent video camera for fun use or security use.

Reviews.Title: CCD Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel Cavazos
Reviews.Content: I like this one, works great on complete darkness, the only thing that they didn't sent me was the BNC female to RCA male adapter, was abel to find it in local store.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: ha
Reviews.Content: This is a wide angle lens, great size, can view large area. My old lens 6mm is not a good compare to this 3.6mm wide lens.

Reviews.Title: Excellent IR 850nm camera for less than $30
Reviews.Author: Lks835
Reviews.Content: For such a low price, this is an excellent product with infrared (IR) wavelength 850nm. Note that the IR 850nm shows visible red dots at night. I tried to use IR 940nm, which is invisible by human eyes at night, but it did not work. It only senses infrared wavelength 940nm as a very weak light emitting from IR illuminator. Perhaps I need other kinds of IR camera for 940nm.

Reviews.Title: Here's the measurements
Reviews.Author: George Pill "Golden Rule"
Reviews.Content: Just got this via UPS and am sure you all want to know what its dimensions are. Fully extended, the whole apparatus measures 7" which is the same length of my open hand from fingertip to wrist. The cone is a little bit over 2" diameter and 4" long. The base is 2-1/4" diameter. You must drill a 3/4" hole into your wall or ceiling to let the grey forking wire through. The power wire and electric plug is included. There are three rotating joints with two of them tightened with a hex tool included in the kit. You WILL be able to point it in any and all directions you desire so no problem here. It is well-designed. How well does it show images? I dunno. I plan to just screw it on the wall outside my front entrance and point it at the door. My door has a little note, "Burglar shot twice on 9-2-09". Ever since then the pesky Mormons stop ringing my doorbell. No guns are in the box so you'll need to purchase those separately. Try short-barrel crack open shotgun with birdshot. Slow death.

Reviews.Title: Posted image.  Very poor quality.
Reviews.Author: Intimate_Things
Reviews.Content: The camera looks and feels great.  The build quality is great.  The image is awful.  They say a picture is worth a thousand words, so I uploaded one for your review.  The camera is less than 4 feet from the merchandise and with "ANY" other camera I have you can read the writing on each package.  I will be sending this back.  I bought into the great ratings.  I guess people that have never had a good camera would like this?  If it were given to me free, I would not use it.[...]

Reviews.Title: Descent Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: rtk
Reviews.Content: Wide angle of view.  Colors are better then expected for the price of the camera.  Night vision is good for what I am using it for.  Much better camera then the ones that came with the Zmodo Security kit.When the Visor is moved past the lens you can see it in the video image.  But I don't need to see the top part of the screen and does a good job blocking out the sun during the day.The bracket is made out of plastic and seems flimsy.  Will see how it holds up.  I bought some heavy duty brackets in case I need to replace the plastic one.

Reviews.Title: Night vision distance doubled from SWANN camera
Reviews.Author: William L. Bradford "brad"
Reviews.Content: THe extra LED's to go night vision allow a distance of over 100 feet. Clarity is much better than the original SWANN cameras in use for 5 years. Price was 1/3 of what I paid for the SWANN cameras.

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Captain Annie "gone2island"
Reviews.Content: My daughter installed this camera near my outside front door and when someone knocks at the door we switch our tv to Video 1 and have a good view of who is at the door.We are going to order more of these for various positions outside our home and my daughter will install those also as she found this one very easy to install.  The little red sign that came with it has been put on my front door where it is easy seen by a visitor.The picture that appears on Video 1 on our 50 inch tv screen is very clear making identification of the person at the door very easy.

Reviews.Title: This is a great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Installed this camera due to having a package stolen from my mailbox recently. For the price, it has a really good picture, the night vision is really clear... I was skeptical on rather or not I would be able to recognize enough features of a person standing at my mail box from 50 feet away..but you can, even at night. I can't speak on weatherability because mine is mounted in a car port and doesn't really see weather...I do like the tamper proof base that conceals the wire, not so much that it keeps someone from cutting the wire...I think if they are going to want to disable your camera a piece of tape over the lense would work just fine...but concealing the wire makes for a much cleaner look. Easy to install, great picture for the price. I recommend on a budget . One thing I will say...and this may go for all night vision cameras, but I can only speak on this one...at 50 feet away in the day time I can read a license plate...however, at night, the illumination of the plate makes it impossible to read...it just glows too bright.

Reviews.Title: Very sharp, good contrast, colors and night vision
Reviews.Author: R. Chhay
Reviews.Content: Pros: The colors are very true to life.  The 3.6mm wide angle lens makes this a good camera for seeing the "lay of the land" or if you're using it in a tight space where you can't place the camera away further.Cons: 420TVL can't see faces or license plates easily.  Not ideal for that application, but you shouldn't try to use a wide angle camera to get a close up picture anyway.  Night vision IR range is limited.  If the area you are monitoring is more than 50ft away from your camera, it will not see anything unless there is another light sourceI use this camera primarily to check out whats going on around my property.  My goal was just to see what was going on outside without having to go to a window to check it out.  These cameras worked very well for my particular use.  I purchased 4 of these cameras to replace the junk cameras that originally came with my DVR system.Bottom line, I would buy more of these cameras if I wanted to expand my system.

Reviews.Title: Amazing for the price
Reviews.Author: Richard G. Evansii "Onlybygrace1"
Reviews.Content: I don't think you can beat this camera for the price. Installation is easy. The night vision is exceptional even in pitch black. Easy to make out animals at 50 feet. Just ordered a third one. They have only been up two days but so far no complaints. I like the fact that they are metal instead of plastic.

Reviews.Title: Cannot beat the deal on these
Reviews.Author: Andrew D. Gullett
Reviews.Content: For the price, I am very impressed with the clarity of the picture day AND night.  I'm very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Solidly built and amazing
Reviews.Author: AMD
Reviews.Content: Been waiting to review these cameras after I got to use them for a while.....now that they have been through rain, snow and single digit temps I can say the camera works better than the dome shaped one I reviewed (not affected by streetlights). Really nice both day and night. the night distance is amazing ....day vision is unlimited...

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: HMH "hmichael0330"
Reviews.Content: I bought this CCTV to add to cover my front door and was glad that I did.  This review is based on my experience with the camera as of now.  Since I got the cam, I installed it inside a widows overlooking the front door and set up my personal software (Blue Iris) for those who are familiar with that powerful software and let it run 12 hrs a day most of the time.  It's been a couple of months now and I have nothing but praise for the cam as it performs without any hick up.  If anything changes in the course of time, I'll upgrade this review accordingly.  Would I recommend this cam to a friend? Yes, absolutely.  For the price, you just can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: PoliceCad
Reviews.Content: Well I was looking for a couple of cheap but good quailty cameras for my new house and came across this one. I read the other reviews and the tech specs and seemed great so I ordered two of them which arrived promptly. I hooked them up to the tv at night just to test them out and they worked great! Nice clear picture day or night, sturdy frame and easy to use. I would defitnitly suggest this camera to anyone looking for a good camera for day/night that doesn't want to break the bank buying one.

Reviews.Title: good little camera
Reviews.Author: F.K.
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with this camera, I bought it trying to purchase something similiar to my stock Swann camera's (pro 530) I was glad to see that this camera worked just as well for a cheaper price, Good color and clarity, Night vision works very well, the thumb securement screw did get in the way of the video cable in the back of the camera and I had to replace it with a longer one but that depends on the mounting angle, I would recommend this camera to anybody adding to their system, (Budget concerned) as long as your ok with black & white night vision.

Reviews.Title: NIce Camera
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: I have three of these now.  They are what they say they are.  Clean and easy to install.  Night vision is good within an exceptable range.  I'm asking for facial recognition of some egg throws, but they are still over fifty feet away.  I can't recognize the face but I can record the clothes, type and color.  That's good for me.  I'm ordering another so I have four, which gives me 360 around my house, 24/7.

Reviews.Title: Great product in a small package!
Reviews.Author: John Hiemstra
Reviews.Content: This camera is a small, unobtrusive unit that provides good clarity out to 60 feet (day) and about 40 feet (IR).  It will provide sufficient detail for recognition of facial features but appears not to have the detail for reading a license plate at 40 feet.  It is a good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good day/night vision camera
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these cameras and ended up buying 2 more.  They are small and work well for the price.  The night vision is good as is the image quality.  I have been quite happy with them.  The only drawback is the color.  While you do get a color image (in daytime - not in night vision mode), the colors are often incorrect.  I could not get a red shirt to look red no matter how I tweaked the video display settings.  If you don't care about color accuracy, this isn't a big deal.  I have the camera wired up through about 40 feet of video cable, so it's possible that is contributing to the color problem.The image is also fairly broad.  I can see most of my backyard with it.  I have another camera installed inside a relatively small bedroom (maybe 15 feet by 15 feet) and I can manage to see the entire opposite wall.

Reviews.Title: Failed VERY quickly Beware!
Reviews.Author: jusanuthaguy
Reviews.Content: I bought this as an add on to an existing system for some extra coverage. I have high end cameras as well so I know what I'm doing. I wasn't expecting much from this camera (at least it was CCD vs CMOS). The power supply hums and picture goes blank after less than 25 seconds.I tried different power supplies ranging from 100 to 500 ma and no difference. Don't let the price fool you. You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: MN user
Reviews.Content: They been working good inhone, in the summer I hade it facing out the window and it's night infrared worked about 25 ft, needs to be up against the window so the LCDs do not shine back, for the money thet are good

Reviews.Title: Very bad camera, This model don't last...no warranty at all.
Reviews.Author: ALAN "Master"
Reviews.Content: Very bad camera durability,it did not last 4 months ,the image became a white like a negative, during the night it's completely foggy ...Don't buy this camera.I contact the seller and no response was received ...no warranty offered ...a complete loss. If i receive a replacement, I will review this comment, but as current 04/07/11 no contact has been made by the seller.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Outdoor Bullet Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I was a little skeptical about ordering these cameras. The price was perfect to fit my needs. The units are surprising in their construction. They seem very sturdy and should stand up to weather. The installation is quite straight forward. The video results are amazing for the price. The images are sharp and the color is not distorted. Namely foliage displayed as purple instead of green. I liked them enough to order two more, which I did. If there is anything to not like about these cameras, it would be in my opinion, the fact that they are not equipped with audio. I remedied that by installing an outdoor mike that I had laying around. The cameras send their video to a Philips quad splitter also in my spare parts supply. From the splitter the video then goes to a VHS/DVD recorder and then to a 19inch color RCA television. Even my wife approves of the system! I would recommend these cameras to anyone in good conscience.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Jackson "Saxon"
Reviews.Content: This camera is great. I have spent many hours looking at CCTV cameras both in the military and while working for clients and I am impressed with this camera especially for the price.Installation was incredibly easy. I mounted the camera to a J-box attached to a 2x6 to the eve of my house and ran the 100ft of videosecu BNC RCA cable through conduit through the stucco into the attic and down the interior wall to the DVR; plugged it in and it works great!some cameras have an issue with lighting when the IR automatically turns on and off, this one does not it flawlessly picks up color at night when headlights shine into its monitoring area. The IR throw is very direct, where the camera is pointing is the area the IR will concentrate on IR can wash out the image if a bush is inline with the cameras Ir sensors at night but this is common. .This Camera isn't the best for use where license plates (license plate cameras are generally pretty expensive and most 'regular' cameras wont pick up license plates) At night this camera will also struggle with distinct facial features. For someone that wants complete clarity, CCTV cameras are not for you almost all of them are pixiated. look at IP cameras they are more money but have better clarity.This is a good camera especially for the price and I am happy with it. For the purpose of being able to see the vehicles in the driveway or who is walking up to my house they work. They are not the best but they are not junk and definitely useful.

Reviews.Title: excellent sharp cameras with quality night vision
Reviews.Author: PHILLIP D.
Reviews.Content: I use these cameras outdoors in New England weather and are excellent performers day and night. Worth the purchase price.

Reviews.Title: Not bad image, but housing very cheap
Reviews.Author: Debbie Fregoso
Reviews.Content: The image is clear, nice IR range, but I cracked two of the three I installed simply by adjusting it.  Where the camera meets base, the metal is very thin and not high quality.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: FlipTopBox
Reviews.Content: I have used these cameras for about 4 months now. I have 4 of them, and they are all mounted on the exterior of my house with nothing blocking them from the elements. So far they have worked flawlessly. As far as the video quality goes, They are not the best. kind of pixelated when on full screen on my TV. You cant make out a license plate from 30 feet away, but don't get me wrong, they are good cameras, and I doubt your going to find a better camera for the price. The night vision works very well for a small yard. They are wide angle so you get a pretty good field of view. I really can't complain. But if your looking for top of the line these aren't for you. They serve my purpose very well for just keeping an eye on things around my house.

Reviews.Title: Great cheap camera!
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Great camera for 35$ - not a single complaint.  Tested it out by hooking it up to my older SD tv with a BNC to RCA adapter that came with the 100 foot cable I bought, picture was just as clear as broadcast TV back in the old days before HD.  Color was pretty true, night vision was excellent.  In pitch dark in my basement I was clearly able to see myself on the TV.  Only thing to note that the IR's glow slightly red when looking straight at them, so people will know there is a camera there.  Can't really see the IR's unless you are directly in front of the camera though.As for installation, what a breeze.  Drilled a 1 inch hole in my fascia (I had removed the soffit and ran the wire along inside the soffit) took the base/bracket off, screwed it in place with three screws, put the wires through the hole, screwed the camera back into the base/bracket and adjusted the aiming of the camera.  Plugged it into my old Geovision 650 DVR pc and instant camera.  Didn't even need any kind of software color/brightness correction.The wire on the camera is very sturdy, not cheap and flimsy like the videosecu 50 foot cables I bought(which did work rather well, and came with two BNC to RCA adapters by the way).  The camera housing is all metal, and the wires are in the housing.  I'm sure a well swung baseball bat would break it, but the houseing is at least all metal.  In case you need to, you can also pull the wire out through a slot in the base if the wire isn't going to go through the wall.Overall, a great investment for 35$  Would buy again!

Reviews.Title: Wide Angle & Very Clear
Reviews.Author: penkyle
Reviews.Content: We have upgraded our system with these cameras.  They are great.  We had Night Owl basic cameras in and these cover so much more ground and are brighter.  I'm ordering more as soon as I can.  I can't stop talking about how much more I like these.  Great deal & totally worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Best camera for the price, have paid more for others that do not work as well.
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: Actually, amazed, I use them in a small business, Wide angle, clear view, and see in the dark, with little or no light.  I have 16 cameras, and these 3 replacements, are better than the others, which I had paid more for. Very Happy, with them, easy to install and everything u need in the box.  Recieved them a week before projected.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these cameras and they work great. The picture is better than the cameras that originally came with my bunkerhill dvr. These cameras have a larger picture area, sharper picture, more contrast and accurate colors. The night vision also works great. I don't believe you can go wrong for the price. I will order 2 more of these cameras soon.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu CCTV Home Surveillance Outdoor IR Bullet Security Camera Color
Reviews.Author: walter loggins
Reviews.Content: This is another camera I recently purchased and I really like it.  The color and focus (and price) are great. Now if I can come up with a cheap way to display all my cameras on one TV!

Reviews.Title: A very good camera with good images
Reviews.Author: Ronald Kinner
Reviews.Content: This camera gives a very good view of our outside door.Mounting was easy and looks goodShipped right on time.

Reviews.Title: Great Quality
Reviews.Author: S. Hinds
Reviews.Content: On receiving this item, I was impressed by the craftmanship that was shown.  The item was well put together and of high quality products it would appear.  I purchased this item to fullfill a need, and it has gone above my expectations.  Very impressive.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera At A Low Price
Reviews.Author: Plexgate "Ol Gene"
Reviews.Content: I have a 16 channel system with an assortment of different cameras. This little camera is equal in performance to some that cost 3 to 4 time more. I read the reviews and was skeptical of the performance but after purchasing one I now have 4. (as soon as they are covered by PRIME again I'll have 4 more) The day time video quality is very good for 1/4 ccd 420 lines and the night video is also very good in black and white with the led having very good range. The mount requires no allen wrenches or screw driver all can be done with one thumb screw, works well in most positions, the cable in the back somewhat gets in the way in some positions. If you are looking for a camera to detect motion around the home day and night and not face recognition at long distance this camera will do the job. I haven't had the cameras for very long so I can't vouch for how dependable they are going to be just hoping for the best!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: El Malo
Reviews.Content: I have mine inside the house and its picture looks excellent. Colors are bright even when lights are dimmed. While in the dark, it seems to pull from any adjacent light source since its picture is cleasr enough to id anyone.

Reviews.Title: Nice piece of equipment
Reviews.Author: Jwill
Reviews.Content: Overall it has very good on screen clarity, even though it has been only 2 weeks since i purchased mine. I still am happy with the results, which being i'm probably going to buy another tomorrow. I would recommend this to any amateur such as myself.

Reviews.Title: vediosecu cctv 24ir l.e.d.
Reviews.Author: Michael Mesa
Reviews.Content: i am surprised at the night vision view with the 24 l.e.d. this camers is alot better than the lorex cams i now realize i payed to much for. so i bought two more. plus the f.o.v. is greater as well.

Reviews.Title: Pretty damn good!
Reviews.Author: Dino "D" "Dino"
Reviews.Content: I had originally set up my system around my home with a Lorex Edge DVR and a 4 camera Zmodo set that I purchased for a good price. Half of the cost of this one, however you get what you pay for. While the Zmodo camera is encased well, it doesn't compare to this one for clarity and range.I only purchased one of these to try it out first, but ordered the other three today as soon as I hooked this one up. All of my cameras are installed outside the property. If these hold up to the elements it is an even bigger bargain. You're just not going to get this type of resolution for this price anywhere else.You can easily set up microphones to your DVR also if you want sound.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: GOOD SERVICE and product was outstanding. I will be in the market to buy three more cameras of this model, trying to replace some two year old models. I like the HIGH RES cameras and GREAT viewing at night with IR. I was able to turn off some night lighting around when using these cameras. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Replacement Camera for Dog Kennels
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: Replacement Camera for Dog Kennels works as well as expected, much better than standard cameras shipped with DVRs, Night vision clarity still a little less than desired.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: camera is nice and a great picture if only had audio it would be one of the best cameras that I bought so far. Night, vision is ok well, at least u can make out who is out there.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Gryphon
Reviews.Content: As the co-founder of SCPARA we research the paranormal and since we do not charge for our services we are always on the lookout for a great product and a reasonable price. I purchased this thinking it would get us by until we could afford a more expensive model. The first time I used this cam I was so impressed at the quality of craftmanship and the picture quality. I would reccomend this product to anyone that has IR Cam needs and is on a low budget.

Reviews.Title: Might be useful, depending on your needs
Reviews.Author: TCG
Reviews.Content: I'm not really sure how this camera got such good reviews.  I agree with another poster who mentioned that the Videosecu cameras have a lot of "fake" reviews that make them sound really good.  Knowing that was probably the case, I decided to try one anyway.First, the camera is much smaller than other cameras I've tested.  The mount was cheap but adequate.  There are three threaded holes on the camera and the base can be screwed into any of them.  One is on top, one is on bottom and the other is on the back.  The cabling does not pass through the base.  The sun shield fits snugly onto the camera body, which is good.  The camera has a real power connector rather than bare wire connectors.I was impressed by the day-time quality of the camera.  It was as good as a $200 camera I bought from another place.  The 3.6mm viewing angle was adequate for covering my 3-lane driveway.  The colors were accurate and the image was crisp.  However, the thing falls on its face when it comes to night vision.  I found the IR to be a little weak.  My biggest complaint is that there is so much noise in the night time image that my Zoneminder system detected motion almost constantly after dark.  I ended up having to just set it to "record" and forget about the motion detection.For my purposes, it just wasn't worth the $40.  I need good night vision.  This camera simply doesn't provide it.Thanks Amazon for letting me return it!

Reviews.Title: Poorly made --- ranked below QSee and Apex
Reviews.Author: Bailey3
Reviews.Content: Shipping and packaging was good.  Camera is poorly constructed, base is very cheap, IR may illuminate 20ft,  picture is very grainy at night.  I have purchased several security cameras of different brands, in hopes to find a decent one at a decent price.  So far, I have purchased a QSee; they are OK but the picture quality deminishes monthly (had for 12 months).  Purchased an Apex, this one is OK but, IR is good for about 20 feet (not impressed).  My recent purchase (Amazon, the VideoSecu Bullet Outdoor) is the worst of all three.  Guess I will keep looking, but you don't want to purchase this one.

Reviews.Title: power supply failed after just 8 weeks
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: After just 8 weeks of use, It seems the Power Supply has failed (possibly the camera, i don't know for sure yet)on the plug there is red led that lights up when there is power to it, well all of a sudden one day my camera wasn't working and i noticed the light is no longer lit.This camera isn't all that great anyway...you can now get 600tvl cameras off ebay for $24 shipped....DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS ONE!!! what a piece of garbage, I'd return it if i could. I'll settle for warning others and causing the company to lose money though.

Reviews.Title: best buy
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: for your buck....there small have fairly good night vision and look good & come w/ power supply great buy at $30.00 I have bought 4 so far ...my first won has been up for about 9 months in all weather still works fine...only needed to dust lens a few times guess I have a few spiders that like the heat from the night vision too........

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu great camera for the price!!
Reviews.Author: Marc Yoe
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera for the price. Video quality is excellent. I've had many other cameras on my security system but for the money this ranks near the top for my overall satisfaction if you want a decent camera that's not going to break the bank.

Reviews.Title: Excellent for the price
Reviews.Author: mfrede
Reviews.Content: I have soem experience with CCTV cameras, especially CCD cameras.  I tried this camera with a windows app (ISpy on WIndows 7) and was not impressed with the image.  I switched it to use with Zone Minder on Linux and wow - what a difference.  Nice, clear image, motion capture works well.  Defiantly worth the price.  Will most like purchase a few more to finish out my security build (putting up cameras on the exterior of the house).

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu CCTV Home Surveillance Outdoor IR Bullet Security Camera Color.  Like it
Reviews.Author: someOne Else "Its me"
Reviews.Content: Does a better job in low light than I expected.  Now when dogs bark I can see if someone is in the drive.

Reviews.Title: It Works Ok
Reviews.Author: B. Miller
Reviews.Content: This is the second outdoor camera I have bought from amazon in this price range. I accidentally shorted the first one out while messing in the power box. The cameras work well for the price but are definately less quality than my initial cameras but my initial cameras for my security system cost a lot more. Usually you get what you pay for but i'm tired of paying crazy amounts of money to get just a bit more quality. These cameras should last long enough and are cheap enough to replace when necessary.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu
Reviews.Author: halbin
Reviews.Content: Did not like it. Had to send it back could not get it to work. Would not recommend it to my friends.

Reviews.Title: EASY INSTALLATION, HOUSING DURABLE, AND GREAT VALUE FOR THE MONEY!!!
Reviews.Author: Scorpio Sun 46
Reviews.Content: I am quite late in providing a comment. Truth is, I am delighted with this camera from VideoSecu, and have purchased several similar cameras from the site over a period of time. I am most impressed with 1) the quality of the image, and 2) their ability to withstand harsh outdoor weather conditions. These are mounted in various points, only a couple of which have any kind of wind break or semblance of protection (i.e., one is mounted beneath the overhang of the main barn and one beneath the overhang in front of the house). Otherwise, they are in the "wide open"---extreme heat, wind, rain, snow, sleet---they have handled them all. Albeit, I do not live in Minnesota or Colorado, but rural SW Ohio has gotten some atypically harsh weather. These cameras are worth the money, excellent construction, video circuitry, and image clarity. I have them installed variously to TV Sets and DVR-Systems.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Eddie
Reviews.Content: So I bought these about a month ago not really knowing much about cameras,  Saw some good reviews on this camera so I bought 2 of them.  Worked great. until one started having issues with the IR everytime they would kick on the recording would be horrible.  (the other one worked like a champ)  easy no hassle return and refund for the defective camera : )  With the refund I went out and purchased a 650tvl camera and when comparing to this camera you can start to see the difference in video quality.  I am still very satisfied with it though as in the setting I have this camera mounted even though the Ir kicks on the image is still in color.  it will only go black and white when it is total darkness.  I really like that it does that.  my other cameras kick into black and white as soon as the ir come on.  Still I would recommend this camera as a started camera for the price and the quality it gives.  If you are looking for something amazing then look elsewhere,  if you are looking for a good value then you might want to give this little camera a chance!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Austin N.
Reviews.Content: Video quality is decent (you really cant beat the price) and it can see in the dark fairly well. Rain does seem to fog them up though.

Reviews.Title: Great wide-angle view, poor night vision
Reviews.Author: Teknynja
Reviews.Content: After reading all the great reviews of this camera, I went ahead and purchased it with the hopes of improving the night vision capabilities of my Zoneminder-based camera system (I'm using this camera with the GrandStream GXV3504 Video Encoder). This camera replaced a TrendNet IP camera, and I was impressed with this camera's much wider field of view. I guess I've been spoiled by the image quality of IP cameras, because right away I noticed this camera's image had much lower resolution than the TrendNet it replaced - now I know that 420TVL isn't really all that great. The big trouble came when the camera switch to night-vision mode. The image was so grainy and noisy that I could barely make out anything at all in the picture, and the motion detection software couldn't "see" anything! I could see the cut filter was active, and the IR lights were on, but the image was totally useless. It may be that this particular camera is defective, but it seemed fully operational in all other aspects.I returned this camera and replaced it with the "eSecure ES183270 Security Camera" (ASIN: B0089GC0YQ) which performs **much** better than the VideoSecu camera. The eSecure has the same wide-angle view as this camera, but has much better resolution, and the night vision works great - I can see small objects at over 50ft away.Many other reviewers indicated they purchased these to replace cameras in their existing "package" systems and found it to be of much better quality - I'm assuming the cameras that come with those systems must be **really** bad in order for this camera to garner such positive reviews. I've been using and tweaking my home brew Zoneminder system for several years, and with the addition of the video encoder have been experimenting with non-IP based cameras for the last few months. Although the wide angle view on this camera is great, the resolution and night vision were worse than anything I've used up to this point. Even for the price, I would not recommend this camera to anyone who is looking for a decent night-vision camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent low price Camera
Reviews.Author: Bayou Country
Reviews.Content: I've bought a few cameras in the past year, however for the price I can't believe the quality of the picture.  Daytime is very good, and night time does have some lighting so I can't say I've seen it in total darkness but very good picture with a little lighting.  I bought two of these as extras and using one of them.  If you want low price camera, I don't think you could go wrong with this one.

Reviews.Title: decent quality for the price- very good night vision
Reviews.Author: Peter Hamilton
Reviews.Content: PROS:good night vision- We live in a city on decently lit side street. The night vision is more than adequate and provides a good illumination, and a good range of greys and blacks which provide proper contrast to be bale to distinguish what you are viewing in the dark.wide field of view: the 1/3 chipset provides a wide view with is 3.66 mm lens. the curb is 21 feet away from my house. i get a 26 food wide field of view at 21 feet from the house. to help figure out the field of view to your desired distance from the camera google CCTV field of view calculator.CONS:dont over-tighten the alan keys that tighten the adjustment for aiming I snapped the arm on two cameras by doing so. It is a lot easier to over tighten on these then you think.video quality: The quality is ok for the price, but only expect to be able to have good facial recognition of strings rom about 10 feet away, you can recognize familiar faces from about 15 feet away.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Andi
Reviews.Content: Video is very clear, even in total dark. It was fairly easy to install by my front door. ... ...

Reviews.Title: Good camera, works well, no issues , easy to install, decent video quality even in low lux
Reviews.Author: Georgyo07 "Georgyo07"
Reviews.Content: Nice reliable camera with ZModo DVR it works well. IR's not too bright, good low lux video. There is a touch of graininess at low lux as well. This is about on par or a little better than some cameras sold on E-bay as being 800 Lines for just slightly less. Compared to the cameras that shipped with my ZModo DVR, this is a bit under that quality. I am using indoors only , in basement, never a problem yet.

Reviews.Title: Best cam for the money
Reviews.Author: andrew "PFC Brian"
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these not expecting anything to good.  But i was wrong these cameras are really clear and work really well.  I am gonna order 18 more to replace the rest of the cams on my dvr.  I would recommend this to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Phuong Ha
Reviews.Content: We recently had a homeless shelter move in by our home and since then we needed cameras to prove to the director there that it is her people coming into our yard and stealing cans, items, trash, stuff on the porch, etc..so this little camera did the trick!It works great under little light conditions, and it has a decent range.  I have a DVR recording 24 hours and the picture quality is pretty good.  I could have gotten a better resolution camera but no need.  I'm not a bank or anything that needs great face shots.During daylight hours, it clear as a bell, at night, it does a really good job under low light conditions.Plan on getting more for the side and back of the house and garage.

Reviews.Title: wide camera shot
Reviews.Author: Sam MT
Reviews.Content: nice camera for wide camera shots, IR good for 30ft, comes with nice sun visor, water proof, low wattage camera

Reviews.Title: Great Cameras for the Price
Reviews.Author: John Mapes
Reviews.Content: I have purchased 4 of these now, they are well made, easy to install and provide good quality images. I replaced my dated cameras with these and have much clearer pictures both day and night.

Reviews.Title: No reason for negative reviews
Reviews.Author: WVUTampaAlum
Reviews.Content: This product is great and I don't unsderstand the negative reviews.  I purchased 2 of these cameras as replacement for my oem night owl 'cheapy' cameras that had come with my nightowl system.  Two of those cameras went out during a lightning storm and I found this camera as an alternative solution.  This camera is a major upgrade over my nihht owl.  I can actually see colors with this camera.  Red and green never showed nuch at all on the night owl but lokks great on this camera!  It is also a much wider angle with this camera.  Before I could only see maybe 2 'lanes' of my 3 car garage driveway and now I see the entire thing and more.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: D. wyk
Reviews.Content: i needed this to monitor my special needs kid.  I watch it on a 37 inch high def tv, his room is 13 feet deep. I can see everything I need, esp at night!  night vision is AWESOME.  day colors are off, black often appears green or blue, but that's ok for my needs.  plug and play IF you have the right kind of adapter BNC Male Plug to 2xRCA Female Jacks Adapter lets you use RCA on your tv.

Reviews.Title: 480 TVL, it's ok product
Reviews.Author: jonnii
Reviews.Content: I ordered these cameras to replace my defenders cams which was out-dated. They are an okay cameras. I don't expect HD quality.

Reviews.Title: A very good camera for a very fair price!
Reviews.Author: Kevin Cormack
Reviews.Content: I purchased a DVR home surveillance system about five years ago in response to things that were going on in my neighborhood.  I figured that in the very least, it would help the police investigate any break-in and might help to get my stuff back.  The cameras that came with that system were very basic CMOS units with small sensors and few TV lines.  The resolution was poor and the color was biased towards infrared, making images recorded in bright sunshine quite disturbing with the IR-forced color shift.  (I'm not a big fan of purple grass.)On occasion, I would refer back to the recordings to try and figure out when a package had been delivered or if I really put that garden tool in that strange place, and the system met my expectations.  Over time, however, I came to realize that the resolution was so poor that any recording would probably not be of significant use to the police after a break-in.  I did my research on upgrading and determined that I needed a camera with a larger sensor and that the sensor needed to be CCD-based.  Armed with that info, I began to search for cameras that I could afford.This camera really fit the bill.  It's not as good as those that I used when I worked in public safety, but these cost thousands of dollars less and offer most of that performance.  The color is good during the day and the resolution in the dark under IR lighting is also very good.  The larger sensor of this camera yields more TV lines, which brings greater resolution along for the ride, and the wider field of view actually allows me to overlap some of my camera zones, something that I hadn't even thought possible.  Moreover, as my house is light colored with white trim, these cameras really blend in so that a casual observer will not notice, while reflecting light and heat off the camera instead of inviting it in as with a black-painted unit.  Less heat buildup inside the unit should offer a greater chance of the unit holding up over time.  Likewise, the metal frame and base should hold up over time much better than plastic-framed or plastic-mounted units as metal is not subject to photochemical reactions that change its basic compound or make it brittle.Overall, I am truly happy with this camera and ended up replacing all of my outdoor cameras with this model.  The little extras that this camera came with including a power supply and a window sticker make it suitable for a first-time install as well as for an upgrade, and with this camera priced as low as some decoy units by other sellers, you know the price is good.

Reviews.Title: For $30....it's good
Reviews.Author: D. BYRD
Reviews.Content: I have a few Videosecu cameras. My house has a total of 10 cameras mixed between traditional cameras (like this) and IP cameras.The image quality of this camera was a bit worse than I expected. The other cameras are 480 lines. The difference between 480 and 420 (this camera) is huge to the point that I'm considering taking the loss on the camera. Additionally the colors are off at times. Again it's $30 not $100.

Reviews.Title: Pleased With These Cameras
Reviews.Author: MWCraft
Reviews.Content: I purchased two of these to go along with a Swann SWDVK-825504 8 Channel DVR system and have been pleased with the purchase.I was able to easily mount them to my garage and configure them in the DVR without issue.  Running the cables thru the walls and ceilings was the hardest part of the process.Day and night video quality is good enough for me and the distance we are trying to cover (30 - 40 feet.)

Reviews.Title: Very decent camera for a great price
Reviews.Author: BobL
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these cameras and installed them today. Main reason I got them is because other reviewers have said they are wide angle, and indeed they are, The image quality and color is as good as my Swann cameras, which are not wide angle and my Lorex cameras, which are. Tonight I will see how they fare with the infra red light they emit for night vision. EDIT: OK, last night they were great in their night vision ability! Better than the Swann's, and about the same as the Lorex'sThey are extremely cheap at 35 bucks each compared to my other 2 brands of cameras I mentioned, and they seem to be of no lesser quality, but time will tell on that issue. My Swann cameras have been trouble free for 5 years so far, out in the weather,They (the new cameras being reviewed here)look like the current image in the item's description here, but some reviewers have shown images that have completely different mounts than these. Another reviewer, Terry, has pointed out that these cameras have leads that are too short (about 20 inches long), but for me, that is fine, as I mount these on or next to a plastic junction box where they plug into a feeder cable.

Reviews.Title: Simple but great
Reviews.Author: kvanvig1
Reviews.Content: What a simple set up.  This camera has a pretty good picture perfect for just a simple viewing area. Great Price.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Seamstressexpress
Reviews.Content: Installed this two weeks ago and so far am very impressed with the picture quality.  Nice and clean in the daytime, clear image at night.

Reviews.Title: awesome camera
Reviews.Author: Paco
Reviews.Content: this camera is great ,i really like the night vision part its so clear for the price ,the only thing isyou have too make your own video cable it doesnt come with one ,it just comes with power adapter . i used reagular tv cable with rca adapter,so you can make it aslong as you need

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Jmarch
Reviews.Content: These are 420TVL and are better than my 480TVL cameras. Color is richer, and clarity is much better. BY NO MEANS is it a high quality camera but it is a tiny step up from what my DVR came with.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: TennWalt
Reviews.Content: I recieved the unit quickly and roight out of the box had it hooked up and running in no time. All led's appear to be working and it preforms as advertised. The only reason i gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because of video clearity but still you can make out figures fairly well. I bought this unit with 100' cable to mount to a tree so i can see who's comming and going from my property, i live in a motothome and off the grid on a backwoods gravel road. I havent tried recording yet but i'm sure it will work. For the price i think its the best deal on amazon for a cable operated camera. One more point of interest i didnt realize is the fact that the charger plugs into the unti via the 100' cable on one side and the video output on the other.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: goran krnecin
Reviews.Content: Great value for the price. Very easy to install and simple to connect to tv, pc or dvr. Highly recomanded for entry level security camera.

Reviews.Title: BEst camera for the money
Reviews.Author: M. A. Watson "mozambrooklyn"
Reviews.Content: First I bought one of these just to test it out, then I ordered another one to match just because they are that awesome.I was very hesitant to order this camera because the price and the reviews seemed too good to be true.  I have a dvr that came with 4 terrible crappy cameras.  I bought an additional camera for $79.99 from bnh and it's quality was a little better than the ones that came with my system.This camera blows the others out of the water.  When I hooked it up and compared it to the other cameras night vision, it was clear.  This camera had a bright COLOR picture of the street outside (way farther down the street because of the great wide-angle it has).  The video is crisp and clear.  These cameras are way bigger than the other ones I have, but for me they work as an extra visual deterrent (while their nice grey color matches the exterior of my building nicely).  The fact that they come with a power supply and a sticker is an added bonus.  The power supply feels really sturdy too.They are wide angle, so I am not sure how they would do in an up-close scenario.

Reviews.Title: Great night time camera
Reviews.Author: ichedo
Reviews.Content: I also purchased one of those home security kits with 4 "night vision" cameras when I purchased this camera. Out of the 5 cameras I have, this is the ONLY one that works great at night. I don't need to leave a light on. It does what is advertised. I love it, and you can't beat the price. If you are looking for a good outdoor camera that does actually work at night, and you don't want to spend a lot of money, BUY THIS ONE!

Reviews.Title: Decent camera
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: The camera works as indicated.  In retrospect, I think I may have preferred to purchase a higher resolution camera like the 720 TVL vs this one (420 TVL).  I use it to record a patio area 10'x10' and you can still easily recognize people.  Night vision is OK.  Fortunately we have a motion sensor light that turns on when someone enters the patio.  This combination of lighting & LED from the camera work well.  So, all in all, I'm satisfied but probably would have preferred better resolution.Update:  Still working well 4 months later.Update of the update:  Still working well as of Dec 2012

Reviews.Title: Works fine
Reviews.Author: D. Faust
Reviews.Content: Works better then I expected.  Much better then the Astak wireless cameras they replaced.  Wider and clearer picture.  Great night vision too, again much better then the Astak.  I bought one just to test it and ended up buying two more.

Reviews.Title: Great Bullet Camera for Home Security
Reviews.Author: ROBERTO
Reviews.Content: I've tried a couple different inexpensive security cameras and this one has been the best yet. I was so shocked by how clear it was compared to my last one. The IR in this camera makes the night vision almost look like daylight images. I could actually see the face and tell who it is! So far it's been a good camera that I would recommend, and will personally be buying at least a couple more of.

Reviews.Title: Perhaps best deal/quality?
Reviews.Author: Ross Mendel "Ross"
Reviews.Content: I originally ordered a more compact security camera, the "tamper resistant" kind that comes in more of a dome shape. But the quality wasn't there, and due to issues with the picture, I had to return it. Seems these slightly larger cameras give you a lot more quality for the money, and I'm certainly happy with the quality of this camera after having it for a few weeks. Great image with and without light, plus nice that they include the power supply (many don't). I'm super-happy with this camera!

Reviews.Title: No more stolen items yeah!
Reviews.Author: mary
Reviews.Content: I am very Happy with my purchase and would recommend to anyone.  No more thefts thank you so much. Very good view and color I wish I could add audio but didn't think of it at moment. Very pleased with purchase and have had no problem with it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: InterACT
Reviews.Content: Great camera- got it as just an added security feature for my current apartment, and it works so well. I later found out that it's the same camera that the bar I waitress at uses for their security monitors. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Bullet Security Cameras
Reviews.Author: John A. Imhoff Sr.
Reviews.Content: When I recieved the cameras I was concerned about the small size, I bought these cameras as a replacement for a set of cameras that came with a security system my wife got for christmas. After installation of the new cameras, I was very pleased with the picture sharpness and the color.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: I'm not a video camera nut. I just bought this because I wanted a security camera on my house. This camera works pretty well in the daytime and ok at night. At night I can see a lot of white fuzzy stuff floating around in the air that that cant' be seen except with the camera. It doesn't affect the vision of the camera, its just distracting. Anyway for the price its a great deal.

Reviews.Title: This camera is ok
Reviews.Author: Craig Collins
Reviews.Content: The build quality is nice, but the image quality is not to great. But for the money I can not complain.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy & Satisfied
Reviews.Author: M. Wood "odds10to1"
Reviews.Content: Just as advertised. Works in complete darkness. Fast delivery. I plan on future business with this company. I am very happy and satisfied.

Reviews.Title: CAUTION!!
Reviews.Author: TERRY
Reviews.Content: THIS IS JUST A BASIC CAMERA WITH POWER SUPPLY, NO BNC CORD IS INCLUDED, WORTHLESS WITHOUT A DVR, NO SOFTWARE, JUST CAMERA, BUY SOMETHING ELSE UNLESS YOU HAVE A DVR AND EXTRA BNC CABLES TO CONNECT IT, OTHERWISE RETURN UNIT AND GET A CAMERA THAT HAS WHAT YOU NEED TO CONNECT IT.

Reviews.Title: Basic security cam with infrared
Reviews.Author: Midland98
Reviews.Content: This unit worked well right out of the box and has been in service for approximately 1 month. The picture is decent for the price. The infrared illumination is about 25-30 feet. Good product for the money.

Reviews.Title: Useless
Reviews.Author: Caitlyn Ferreira
Reviews.Content: Wasn't compatible with the home system I have and it was useless to me I would of loved to return but never got a message back about it!

Reviews.Title: OK but nothing great
Reviews.Author: Chris Ondo
Reviews.Content: This camera is so so for short distance's but is not good for facial recognition beyond 20 feet.The camera is very durable and well built.The old saying goes.You get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: idk about yours, but mine came used and broken
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: When my box arrived, the packaging looked new but when I opened it, the whole side was scraped and the mounting bracket was broken. I had three already, and when I installed this one, it did not work. May have been an accident, but still should not happen. -_-

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Security Camera
Reviews.Author: John B.
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this camera.  I only paid $35. for the camera and for the price I m very pleased. The camera is out in the weather doing fine.  Small camera seems to be constructed nicely.  Easy to mount.  For the $ you can't go wrong. Day and night shots are very good.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for 2 weeks
Reviews.Author: Lil
Reviews.Content: These are the best little cameras, very clear picture, wide angle viewing, even the night vision is pretty good. Highly recommendThis is now 2 weeks later and the camera just died for no reason. It was nice while it lasted

Reviews.Title: CCD is better than CMOS
Reviews.Author: Dean T. Martin "Larger Leon"
Reviews.Content: I replaced an inexpensive CMOS camera with the VideoSecu CCD camera, and the improvement is impressive. The 24 IR LEDs really make a difference at night, and daylight performance is also much better. Overall, the CCD imager handles a wider range of contrast with much less noise. The 3.6mm wide-angle lens also covers more area. The camera only has 420 lines of resolution, which is on the low side, but the improved nighttime performance makes up for that. The camera and mount seem to be well made, and the cable has plenty of length.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA, WILL ORDER ANOTHER ONE
Reviews.Author: Gadget Guy "Gizmos"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera based on all the positive reviews, I always come here when I'm buying to read what others are saying.  This camera is better than the other 4 I already have. I will order a second to replace two of the others. I really liked that the signal cable is cheap to make - does not require the split type as on my other camera's.  I buy bulk coax cable and custom cut the lenght; add the BNC connectors and I'm done! A 100ft of cable is approximately $7 bucks and the connectors are $2 bucks.  The image is fantastic.  I do have one ity-bity, tineey weeny grip however.  The lens is 3 mm and therefore detail such as capturing licenses plates is not possible beyond, say 10ft.  I need to capture plate numbers at 50ft and to do that I need at least 8mm or better 12 mm.  There is a camera that is 12mm and I plan to buy it on black Friday. As I write this, I'm thinking maybe I should buy 2 more cameras to cover the back yard too. Oh, almost forgot to mention, the LEDs are way bright and I can see several hundred feet out at night, however the mounting location must be such that the bright IR does not reflect back to the camera due to objects in front of the lense. Objects such as shrubery, eves, etc will tend to wash out the image due to reflected IR bounce back.I mounted the camera over the drive-way and at night, the bright LED allows me see across the street and beyond. Total cost out door with shipping is approximately $42 bucks.  Good Luck!

Reviews.Title: Not Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Aziz
Reviews.Content: The shipment process was very fast, however the product is not all that great in quality.  I currently have 16 camera security system and I replace one of the old camer with the new one.  The quality is poor, I guess I got what i paid for.  With this camer I am viewing less than 5 Feet, but the image is poor.

Reviews.Title: order
Reviews.Author: tjelks
Reviews.Content: This product was recieved quickly but did not include the power supplies as stated, Besides that the product was as described
