Reviews.Title: Outstanding Camera,BIG on Performance and Value
Reviews.Author: mike adams
Reviews.Content: This is an Outstanding Little camera.I have ordered other camera's with better specs,but none come close to its performance.It has very good night vision,Great color depth and clarity.I also highly recommend the seller,and as always Amazon is fantastic to deal with.I have 2 in use now and I am about to order 3 more.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed for an awesome price
Reviews.Author: James Kieley
Reviews.Content: Great picture! Mounting kit that it came with really helped. And a price I couldn't beat. It was easy to install, and looks great, Useing this for theft deterrence.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great picture.
Reviews.Author: vik
Reviews.Content: Great camera, great picture. Love it, will buy again. Price is also very good. If any of my other 7 cameras go bad, they will be replaced with this unit.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Alan Fentem
Reviews.Content: Great little camera for the price. This is my first security system. I plan on adding two more of the VideoSecure cameras with 700 TVL lines to see if it improves the longer range clarity. If not, it didn't cost much more, so I won't complain. I'm not about to shell out big bucks for a high resolution camera, but it would be nice to have. I would recommend this to first time buyers. I am curious to see at what temperature these cameras will fail. I plan on getting housings with heater and blower fans for a couple of cameras, because the winters here are brutal. -40F low, long stretches of -20F.

Reviews.Title: very poor image quality
Reviews.Author: Judy
Reviews.Content: the picture is Fuzzy - unclear at day time.(you can just see something is moving in the picture there but can't tell what is that.)  it doesn't work at all at night! Ridiculous!!!!!!  This is security product, should watch our home day and night, especial at night ,but.....  i really want to send those pieces of junk back , but the shipping fee cost more.  Very disappointed . Buyer beware.

Reviews.Title: really like it
Reviews.Author: hellga
Reviews.Content: my review is same as the 100ft cord that connects to this. It takes both to have a great picture .

Reviews.Title: WORK GREAT!
Reviews.Author: KLC
Reviews.Content: The clarity is good, was easy to install (after buying the longer cables) and so far doing a great job.  We just connected them to a DVR and wala.... hopefully we can catch the person damaging our property while we're at work :o}

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Great Price
Reviews.Author: stuart hampton
Reviews.Content: Better picture than previously owned cameras. Very good night vision at about 30 to 40 yards but, you can see objects further out.Hidden wiring in base is a plus for looks, security and weather proofing. All parts including cover on top are metal and good quality.Comes with the power adaptor. Just add a BNC cable as long as needed, VideoSecu has them with power line included.To me this camera has better picture than you would think from reading the specifications.

Reviews.Title: App?
Reviews.Author: Kadee
Reviews.Content: I actually have a question. Does this camera come with a phone app or do you have to have a minister to see everything?

Reviews.Title: Great Cameras
Reviews.Author: tanStaafl
Reviews.Content: For the price you can't beat them! Easy install and setup! The IR nighttime works like a champ. A low cost good quality camera.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: msadder
Reviews.Content: We got this because someone was stealing our mail.since we put it in window none has touch our mail,it is weatherproof our windows get very hot from the sun. And it has very good quality picture worth the price very good security to have

Reviews.Title: Nice Surprise
Reviews.Author: SLV
Reviews.Content: This VideoSecu CCTV Home Surveillance Outdoor IR Bullet Security Camera, Is surprisingly clear and appears to be constructed well. The cost is right and if needed I would purchase another one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera with a great price
Reviews.Author: Todd Maure
Reviews.Content: I won a camera system I bought from EZwatch and needed to replace one.  This one performs perfectly fine.  The quality is good and it seems pretty durable.  You can't beat the price either, definitely a worthy buy if you need a camera for simple surveillance.

Reviews.Title: this thing is great has great color even at night
Reviews.Author: Frederick
Reviews.Content: I use this on the back door to let my sister see who is at the back door.I brought this for her security and its a great camera and it has a wide viewing field and easy to install .I installed mine threw the attic and down threw the wall.Real easy,very satisfied with this product and would recommend it to anyone who doesnt want to open thier door to some one knocking till they see them on this camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: mynativespirit "mynativespirit"
Reviews.Content: This is the first camera I've bought and I am very impressed with the ease of set up and use.  This is a nice camera for the price and quality. It's excellent for what I bought it for, which is to keep an eye on our parking lot.  i

Reviews.Title: Camera Great!  Power adapter not so much.
Reviews.Author: Tom Blocher
Reviews.Content: The camera worked perfect.  Very good resolution of normal security camera use.  The power adapter did not work.  I had one of my own, so no big deal for me, but nevertheless, it was bad.

Reviews.Title: Great Video quality
Reviews.Author: Tamcan
Reviews.Content: I replaced a CUV camera and this one STOMPS IT's LITTLE BUTT! Great video and great range and wonderful price too!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: EddieLo
Reviews.Content: What impressed me the most is how clear and sharp it is at *night*  Although at night it is in B&W; you can see everything.  I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: good quality
Reviews.Author: william
Reviews.Content: Good clean picture and see night sight too. I bought two of it cuz of low price then menard store.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Axcited
Reviews.Content: I had to replace a failing camera. It is used indoors.  Works great.  Good coverage and IR illumination for a bullet camera.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Ronald Freeman
Reviews.Content: It accomplished my needs just as advertised. I would recommend it to all. It was at a reasonable price and well designed. It solved my problem.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: rkeehn2000
Reviews.Content: The camera is a little larger than what I was expecting.  The image quality is great and the night vision illumination is much better than any of my other security cameras.

Reviews.Title: This camera is awesome especially for the price! Way better than the cameras I have that I bought in a 4 camera DVR set.
Reviews.Author: SV
Reviews.Content: This camera is awesome especially for the price! Way better than the cameras I have that I bought in a 4 camera DVR set. I am using it indoors and the night vision and color is excellent in a medium sized room. I bought a 2nd one to try outside but haven't gotten it hooked up yet.  The only problem I had is the seller advertised this camera including a "bonus" power adapter because it doesn't come with one. The bonus power adapter was not in the box. I contacted amazon and they gave me the option to return it for another one or 40% off the camera. I kept the camera and ordered the power supply for about $7 which I received a few days later.

Reviews.Title: Got a little more than what I paid for
Reviews.Author: PokerFace
Reviews.Content: Can't beat it for $30. The image and IR is very acceptable for $30If you are looking for Crystal Clear HD ... move on to a high dollar HD IP Setup.Using mine on a QC-528 system to replace a Q-See camera that has ripples in the picture. Probably a capacitor, I know.Looking to switch to HD system ... this works in the interim.Easy to install (Replace my old camera.)

Reviews.Title: not crisp image quality
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Color is closer to reality, but 480 tvl is very....non detailed. Don't expect crisp image quality. Install was simply, mounting is very good. Requires an Allen wrench and is included in the box.

Reviews.Title: Good!
Reviews.Author: BigJohn "Big John"
Reviews.Content: Really nice camera, even if it is chinese. Resolution is as good as any in this price range. Really good night vision out to about 75 feet.

Reviews.Title: Nice day & night
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I designed CCTV systems for 15 years from cheap to very high end. This is a cheap camera,but it has a great color image during the day, and black & white at night with the LED's.  The image is rock solid on a computer monitor using an Amazon product converter -  CCTV Camera BNC S-Video VGA to Laptop Computer PC VGA Monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great for my needs
Reviews.Author: Kevin Brunner
Reviews.Content: I needed a video camera that has an RCA output, in order to use it with a tivo (which I use for diving). This camera utilizes a BNC connection, but most BNC cords have an RCA adapter included that you can attach right on the end of it. Camera quality is good, and works great for recording a dive practice and playing it back live on the tivo.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the money
Reviews.Author: anonj
Reviews.Content: Install base on a horizontal surface, above or below. This allows simple, three-axis aiming:  - up and down  - left and right  - rotate cw and ccwWould be perfect if it had manually adjustable zoom.

Reviews.Title: Works great. Clear picture!
Reviews.Author: Customer in Utah
Reviews.Content: This was easy to set up and install and works really well.  I am able to see the deer around my place at night and it has a wide area that it records.  It records everything that happens in my back yard and the back of my house!  I would recomend this camera!

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Camera
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Turner
Reviews.Content: For a cheap camera this one is a winner.Crisp clear color and very good night vision. Will definitely be ordering more in the future.  Good product.

Reviews.Title: Sharp!
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Sees just as well at night as in the day. Very clear picture and it is definitely outdoor compatible. Will recommend to friends.

Reviews.Title: Get it!
Reviews.Author: buddy and daisy
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied for the price.  Clear sharp pictures with good black and white with very little light.  Wireless is a waste of money because they are easily disabled remotely.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: crobin1
Reviews.Content: These are the best camera's for the price, you can't go wrong. These are fixed lens camera's so there will be no need to focus. Only point it in the direction you want to cover. Solid, adjustable and weather proof. I purchased four of these initially and have just now purchased five more. Great camera for the price!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: This was worth the asking price, but could easily demand more to purchase it.
Reviews.Author: Charles Johnson
Reviews.Content: I already own over a half dozen of these cameras. I bought this as a spare and I will be buying more. The do it yourselfer can't go wrong with camera. It is crystal clear especially in after dark with no artificial lighting.

Reviews.Title: videosecu home surveillance camers
Reviews.Author: Bob C.
Reviews.Content: the cameras works will outside and works just like I wanted them too. I can see all day and night.

Reviews.Title: videosecu CCTV home surveillance outdoor IT bullet security camera
Reviews.Author: chente
Reviews.Content: this camera is a good value, image quality is really good (as other reviewers have said) and night vision is great. I emailed company who said warranty is only one month, that is not so good. It has held up under a light drizzle so far but California does not rain much, it is in driect sunlight all the time though. The elbow connection adjustment is flaky and hard to work with, like they needed to add a little more shaft metal or something to grip on to but it works.

Reviews.Title: Wow, great coverage, even at night.
Reviews.Author: RD
Reviews.Content: I have several security cameras supplied by ADT, but bought this one to cover a blind spot. It is every bit as good at the ADT cameras that cost $375 each. I highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: great pictures
Reviews.Author: bilko
Reviews.Content: Second buy .  first one worked good so i feel that no problem with the second.  probably buy more  in the future.

Reviews.Title: Nice Cameras!!
Reviews.Author: CONNIE COLTER
Reviews.Content: So many people are starting to have trouble in our area, hope this helps to prevent trouble for our family!

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu IR Bullet Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Tim Mitcham
Reviews.Content: It delivers everything I wanted and I was very pleased that the picture was so good for a camera that costs as little as this one does.

Reviews.Title: Decent Camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: kendall
Reviews.Content: I own 2 1080p video cameras for security.  This camera works great, its very reliable and easy to setup.  The only down side is the picture quality.  Now that I have gone IP HD camera's I wont go back unless absolutely necessary.

Reviews.Title: loving these cams
Reviews.Author: Kozy Dude
Reviews.Content: I bought a zmodo system and it was a great little set for the price but then i needed more for my store so i bought the zmodo 16 channel dvr and decided to give these a try.  I bought two just to test them because the reviews were attractive.  I added these cams to the zmodo DVR and couldn't believe how much they have out done the zmodo's cam on their own system. the view is so crisp and clear and much wider than zmodo's i will be buy more of these to add to the 10 cams i already have at the store then 8 more for the other zmodo 8 channel DVR that i now have for my home.  The reviews are not a hype they are good and won't break your pocket.

Reviews.Title: Reliable, Clear picture
Reviews.Author: Centa
Reviews.Content: This camera works better than another popular brand that I have tried. I would buy another VideoSecu over other products for bullet type cameras.  The color is not great, but not necessary for surveillance at home.

Reviews.Title: Camera is great for night coverage
Reviews.Author: David Knotts
Reviews.Content: Camera can get overwhelmed by the sun causing the picture not to be great but for night coverage the LED's help give the camera a wide area of coverage.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Chheung
Reviews.Content: Very good home security camera. It is a good camera to have for home. I now can see what is happening in front the house.

Reviews.Title: much better than standard cameras on zmodo kits
Reviews.Author: Jeremy
Reviews.Content: put this on my back yard. It works much, much better than the standard zmodo cameras that came in my DVR kit.  The night vision works very well.  I have a shed that sits about 75 feet from my back porch that I can easily see during the night.If anyone was wanting to mount this to an electrical box, the plate can be removed and the camera is able to screw onto a standard 1/2" conduit knock out.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: JBP
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these to see how well I like them. I liked it so much i ordered three more. These seem to be good cameras for day and night use. I would recommend these cameras as a add on to any system.

Reviews.Title: great products
Reviews.Author: Erik Huang
Reviews.Content: I buy three cameras and there are all working great,  Clear pictures on daytime.  night images are okay, it is better than some expensive cameras.  Installation is very easy.  Great for outdoor.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: rjb77
Reviews.Content: So much better than the ones that come with the Zmodo package.  This camera is mounted apx 28 feet above the ground, looking at a large parking area.  The night view is extremely bright in this poorly lite area.  We'll see how it handles extreme cold weather this winter.

Reviews.Title: Nothing to brag about
Reviews.Author: Handy Rican
Reviews.Content: Solid construction and good wide angle view but colors look washed and the picture is not sharp.  I have this camera looking into my dinning room/ living room so it's a location where sharp pictures and colors aren't that important.  I would recommend something with a higher TVL like a 700 TVL camera and with a CCD sensor instead of a CMOS chip.  This camera is best suited for applications that don't require a high level image quality.

Reviews.Title: CCTV review
Reviews.Author: Stanley V. Patino
Reviews.Content: The picture response is clear and crisp. What I find best is the night or low light view. The ability to angulate in different directions is quite good also.

Reviews.Title: Works Great, Less Than 1/3 The Cost of "L" Brand
Reviews.Author: John Thomas Smith
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera Sept 2013 to replace an "L" brand camera that I bought in June 2012 (June 2012 camera died... just out of warranty)While the specifications say there are fewer video lines than the "L" camera, the picture still looks good on the 15 inch monitor connected to my security DVR (also "L" brand)The "L" brand camera was $109 this one is $30 - guess which brand I will buy when we build a new house?

Reviews.Title: Good for short range only
Reviews.Author: Nor'easter
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for inside of garage  and the LEDs weren't strong enough to light up the 30x30 garage so I had to order a led light extender which provides more lighting. I didn't expect much with the low price for this camera but if you're looking for a outdoor cctv look at a better one because you will be disappointed with this camera. It's fine in a garage but not for outside security

Reviews.Title: Nothing to rave about.
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: Picture is not that clear and the night vision is only about 7 feet outdoors. In the front yard it seemed to be a little better and as the sun went down had some beautiful colors. I was at first rather impressed.  In the backyard the camera seems to have problems with bright light causing a glare.The first camera I bought was a $94 Zmodo.  So I already knew what a good camera looked like on the monitor.For the price it isn't a bad deal.  Just don't expect too much.

Reviews.Title: Nice video for a temporary CCTV application
Reviews.Author: Kevin P. Joy
Reviews.Content: This camera was originally purchased for a temporary application involving 24hour monitoring of the deck of a research vessel.  The camera was mounted outdoors and experienced significant salt water spray from waves and water from rain.  During the course of a 10 day operation, the camera performed flawlessly and provided very good quality video both night and day.  Highly recommended system overall...

Reviews.Title: Great pic for 420 camera
Reviews.Author: xtian
Reviews.Content: The daytime and night vision pictures are great for this price point.  Camera is small and discrete, and its a bonus that it comes with its own power converter.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Christopher Holdren
Reviews.Content: the night vision is amazing and so is the picture. I was very pleased with this product. The shipping was great and it's easy to hook up I had to order some hook ups adapters for my VCR but is you go old school your going to have too. But even with the VCR it comes out great looking.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price
Reviews.Author: Corina Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: These cameras are a great replacement to the Q-See cameras that are starting to fail after three years.  It's a good replacement.

Reviews.Title: Great Product, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: This product shows pretty decent pictures for an analog camera and you can even see in the dark.  Product arrived with no problems as well.

Reviews.Title: Good camera for decent price.
Reviews.Author: gduncan229
Reviews.Content: Bought this to upgrade the quality of one of our cameras. Was a vast improvement for our original one. Only issue was that it has a wide view so had to move the location of the camera so that it could be more focused on the area we needed it to be focused on.

Reviews.Title: Works ok but doesn't withstand the rain.
Reviews.Author: J. Schmidt
Reviews.Content: Right now, I have water inside my camera that is mounted in the open.  It still works, but it needs to be cleaned out and I'm too lazy to do it.  I'll get to it eventually.  There is literally a lake inside my camera.  The other one, that is mounted under the eaves, is dry.  This is not truly an outdoor camera, apparently.  But it's been working for two years and it still works even though it is wet inside.

Reviews.Title: Clear specially the night vision
Reviews.Author: gilbert
Reviews.Content: I purchased one for my home and loved it. I need another one for my business and definitely will get the same model again.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera.
Reviews.Author: Ray562
Reviews.Content: I got this camera because it said it was a good camera and I couldn't go wrong with half off.It is pretty good and will be adding it to my other camera's.

Reviews.Title: Great camera...
Reviews.Author: Bryce
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera and haven't had any issues with it. Own about 60 different cameras from about 7-8 different manufacturers. These are inexpensive, reliable and work great with ANY DVR system. I keep a bunch in stock for people who have other camera's fail, then I can throw one of these up and they are back in business.

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Ronnie Kirksey
Reviews.Content: these work ready good for the money i am well pleased with my camerasand would buy again the same ones

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: Ross Jordan "Shalop"
Reviews.Content: I needed to add a camera for a new entrance. The price was right. The housing is all metal. The base is removable for easy installation. One thumbscrew to lock the camera in position. LED night lighting was a bonus. Good picture quality. This is an interior installation so I can't say how well it would hold up outside.

Reviews.Title: home use
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: Very happy with camera. Great price. Easy install. these have a better than most picture .We put them in to watch the kids and house.

Reviews.Title: bullet
Reviews.Author: Gwen Bishop
Reviews.Content: wonderful product  has a very clear picture day and night  in fact im buying 2 more to put on the rest of my property  this camera totallt met my expectations it has great range  great for the price  i have hadthis camera for approx  a month with no problems

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mclumber
Reviews.Content: This camera is easy to install and has a great picture(even outdoors). For the price it can't be beat. Don't forget the cables to hook up to your TV/hard drive.

Reviews.Title: very good.
Reviews.Author: Sandyx36
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera. I was amaze at the quality and clarity of the video. For the price you cannot beat this.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Marcio
Reviews.Content: The camera has a good definition at night..It gives you what it promises at an affordable price, and with a free power supply

Reviews.Title: Not the Same Camera as Last Year
Reviews.Author: CR Stuart "Rick"
Reviews.Content: I ordered 4 of these cameras last year and they worked very nicely.  Good clear images, fairly good in the dark, etc.  One failed a few weeks ago, so I ordered a replacement....The mount is better, Same nice fit and finish, but the image seems a little less clear.  I am deciding if I want to return it, or grin and ignore it.Tried to look at the details of the order I placed last year, but it takes me to the exact same spot.And, yes, my wife just threw out the packaging...I have to give this camera 5 stars for external appearance and improved mount, but I can only rate the quality of image of this new unit at 3 stars.  3 stars because the one I replaced (Same as this?) died after 6 months.

Reviews.Title: Limited
Reviews.Author: Ms Rich
Reviews.Content: Still at the stage of trying to get it to work with a cable longer that the one I ordered with it.  So I'll get back with you after all the trouble shooting.

Reviews.Title: Very good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: M. Harris
Reviews.Content: I needed a replacement for one of my CCTV cameras, and I wanted a wide angle.  This one works great.  High quality image.  I will be buying this again when it's time to replace or upgrade my other cameras.

Reviews.Title: Okay
Reviews.Author: Rebeccca Hairgrove
Reviews.Content: It is difficult to position and keep in place. Resolution is okay but not great. I will probably not purchase another of this style.

Reviews.Title: cctv camera
Reviews.Author: lcruse
Reviews.Content: This is a good little camera and is cheaper to buy because it comes with a power supply.i do recommend it.

Reviews.Title: SEEMS TO WORK OK
Reviews.Author: LP
Reviews.Content: the camera works ok but can not be used for covert surveillance at night because the LED's for night vision glow red in the dark.

Reviews.Title: Decent but not great.
Reviews.Author: AcuraMax "Emax"
Reviews.Content: This camera has awesome clarity during the day, even in low light, but at night, the image is very noisy.  I connected it to a Toshiba 19" widescreen LED TV, via my VHS recorder.  So from the camera, to the recorder, to the LED TV.  I used the best possible cables I have, they had gold connectors, and they are not Radio Shack specials, they are really high quality cables.  So really the signal from the camera was fairly good, without the cables reducing the image quality much.I mounted it outside under the roof eves to a center patch of trees and shrubs we have.  I wanted to see what was messing up our center planted area every other day. Was it an animal or person, something was doing it.  So I pointed the camera there and after 2 days, I finally got my answer.  It was a little black bird with a yellow beak. I was stunned, I thought it was maybe a stray dog, or maybe a cat, or a squirrel, it was this little bird, he was looking for worms.  I would record from 3am till about 8am, he actually came between 6:45 - 8am.  I could not believe it.Anyway, back to the camera, the performance of the camera is really awesome in daylight.  When it transitions from night to day, the image really comes alive.  During the night the infrared leds on the camera illuminate the view, but the image is mostly black and white, you really have to spend time adjusting the contrast and brightness to get the clarity of the image.  Aside from the night image, it is very easy to connect and install.  The mounting hardware and power supply are all included.  It does use a BNC connector for the video, so you may need a converter to RCA to connect to a recorder or a monitor, unless those devices have a BNC.

Reviews.Title: Help with setup
Reviews.Author: Bar "SunInSanDiego"
Reviews.Content: This seems like a great camera but I need help. We continue to get egged almost every Friday like tonight. I bought this camera but the instructions are not detailed. Do I use a DVR that we have from Time Warner in San Diego. I guess I need to buy the longer cables. The cable connected to the camera is only about 2 feet long. Unfortunately where we want to mount the camera is in the front of the house, second story ledge where we have a bedroom with no TV or DVR. We will probably have to run cables temporarily down the hallway to our bonus room that has a TV and DVR. Does this sound right? Are there any other options for a recording device in the bedroom? We do have a cable outlet there. Thanks for any help!

Reviews.Title: Good image quality, but dead after 35 days
Reviews.Author: Frank K "Frank"
Reviews.Content: Bought the camera, thinking it would suffice for what I needed, which was a low cost camera with a decent image quality. While the item worked the image quality was excellent.After 35 days the camera died and was no longer available, so it was returned for a refund.

Reviews.Title: Now we see you!
Reviews.Author: Donald Moore
Reviews.Content: You mite think this camera is a cheap knock off, but don't let the price fool you. What a deal !

Reviews.Title: Cheap and Missing Parts
Reviews.Author: gg
Reviews.Content: It's missing parts, the image is bad, and the camera doesn't work.No wonder it was so cheap!Do not buy.

Reviews.Title: thsnk you
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Very nice thsnk you for all your servers thsnk you again I want to buy some morr camaras ag as I

Reviews.Title: garbage camera. sturdy construction, blurry picture
Reviews.Author: B. Arbonel "Jean"
Reviews.Content: i tested this camera for a few days in < 32 degree weather. Day picture was not clear at all. Night picture was very blurry.  Waste of time.

Reviews.Title: CCTV Camera
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey W Goodrich
Reviews.Content: This camera had a good crisp picture and worked well under low and no light conditions. Easy to install and mount.

Reviews.Title: I have a question
Reviews.Author: Jerone
Reviews.Content: hello Amazon users this is my first time buying this camera. my question is what exactly do i need to purchase with this camera? like what type of cords or what is the name of the cords i need and if i get a LONG cord like 150 feet will it affect the camera?the way this Cam is talked about im ready to buy it NOW!

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Kelton
Reviews.Content: I bought this Camera as an replacement, the video is grainy and has some interference, you really cant make at much past 50 ft. However at night it does some better the IR really is bright. I will not buy another one of these cameras.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the trouble or the money...useless!
Reviews.Author: thejedhi
Reviews.Content: I'm not happy with it at all. Theyake it seem so simple. The device needs extra equipment and additional devices (like a DVD or computer) which requires wiring to be strung all along the walls. Looks bad. I tried and tried. Didn't find out soon enough that if you have UVERSE with the digital recorder for programs there's no way to hook it up without removing everything, then your TV AND INTERNET DONT WORK. What a waste!

Reviews.Title: need more info on the description
Reviews.Author: happy in wisconsin
Reviews.Content: I did not realize until we received this camera that a video recorder was necessary to use with it. I thought it was the type that uses an SD card like the wildlife camera. There was nothing in the description to prove otherwise. Maybe that is why the price looks like such a good deal.....

Reviews.Title: No cable
Reviews.Author: John "John of Tomball"
Reviews.Content: Bummer, I didn't realize that I also needed to buy a BNC cable. Got it but can't even try it out.

Reviews.Title: great security camera
Reviews.Author: Freddy
Reviews.Content: I received this camera and looked it over. I was very please with its construction. However, when I received it I was mad with myself for not ordering the cable. When I ordered the cable and received it, I thought I would plug it in and be done with it, but no. I was trying to connect it and I have no clue what type of plug that is. Does anyone have an idea of what it is called so I can order one? Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Not an IP camera.
Reviews.Author: wk
Reviews.Content: This is not an IP camera, but regular security camera with composite video output and I don't know why when I was looking for an IP camera this one was shown between other IP cameras.

Reviews.Title: returned item
Reviews.Author: Talana Flanagan
Reviews.Content: Was not what I needed, ordered for son and it was wrong thing so I returned it for a refund/

Reviews.Title: Niether good or bad just so so!
Reviews.Author: Lee Perez "LP"
Reviews.Content: Cheap but maybe not what you need, do research before committing and make sure its exactly the type of camera you really need with attachments needed to function included, this one did not.

Reviews.Title: Bad resolution, bad quality
Reviews.Author: Saram Chea
Reviews.Content: Very pixelated and has terrible night vision, you can't make out faces with it even at a very close range (within 5 to 10 feet). The further the distance the worst the quality. It's a good temporary solution to monitor what's going on in  your vicinity. I upgraded to a better camera that cost a few bucks more with a better resolution. 420 TVL is the lowest quality for an analog camera. You want to get 700 TVL for good quality because that's the highest resolution for analog. Check out security camera king or nelly surplus. It served it's purpose because I was able to monitor my mail box and front yard, however I wouldn't buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Disapointed
Reviews.Author: C_Rod
Reviews.Content: Could never use the camera. All connections were not included, not enough instructions. Product looked in good shape.  Camera wouldn't come in clearly. Tried it on 2 different tv monitors.

Reviews.Title: I like camera
Reviews.Author: Dragon M.
Reviews.Content: camera is  "ok"  day light  but nite no good and bot is blurry  on distance....  better my web cam Microsoft 6000 working......lolhttp://69.207.20.58:8080/

Reviews.Title: returned
Reviews.Author: mack
Reviews.Content: Camera wouldve probably worked ok, but they didnot mention that you need a several hundred dollar camera specific dvr to operate it.

Reviews.Title: CAUTION!!!!!
Reviews.Author: spero
Reviews.Content: Needs way more information about the product posted on Amazon. I bought this not knowing much about security cameras, did not mention if it is wireless or not (its not). Now I will have to drill holes in my house, and run wires half way across my house to my TV. I also didn't know that the cord was so short and had to then buy an extension wire as well. (more money). And if that wasnt enough, I thought it was great that it "just plugs into your DVR" only to learn (after I purchased the product)that my DVR doesnt support video in. So if I want to use this product and record video, I will have to purchase a different DVR (again, more money). Dont let the 40 dollar price tag fool you. That is for the camera only! The extension cord and means to record are extra. It also did not explain any of that in the product manual as well. Might be good for a "regular security camera user" but for a beginner, it severely lacks information and instruction on both amazon and the manual. Just make sure to do your homework, and make sure your DVR supports security cameras before you buy this item

Reviews.Title: Gave as gift
Reviews.Author: Georgia McAfee
Reviews.Content: Don't know how it has worked as gave as a gift to my son. Not sure if he has got it installed yet. Looks nice though.

Reviews.Title: The jury is still out
Reviews.Author: Teri
Reviews.Content: After a week I finally have the server DVR running. The pictures are not as nice as I had hoped, but I may have sun issues. The color is way off and the directions for installation and operator use are at best a joke. The proper way to get the drivers to work is NOT included in the software disk - come on guys! We installed the client today and of course it does not work. I wonder if there is something else I should know about the clients driver. Just because it is just a horrid chore to install does not make this a bad camera. As soon as I figure this out I'll repost a firm positive or negative. An to Lo Jack - can I hire you to come get this puppy barking?

Reviews.Title: Not easy to install, not wireless!
Reviews.Author: Y. Polanco
Reviews.Content: No instructional manual, no ext. cable, no details whatsoever as to how to connect this camera and make it work?! Had a friend try to install it up on my wall and that's it! The cables are not long enough to even reach the plasma TV! And it's pretty close mounted to the TV! So how is this suppossed to be an outdoors camera? It only works if connected to TV, DVR, etc... My friend couldn't figure this out and neither can i? How does it work? How does it video record? Can someone give me some details? I bought 3 of these, and now stuck with them...It'd cost more to return than it was to buy! To me this camera sucks! Needs more instructions and how to's!
